thread.title: Computer Business For Sale

title: Computer Business For Sale
text: Questions Business Summary Computer business for sale, Established for over 30 years, computer repairs, sales, service, network installs, Government, Educational reseller. Provincial wide sales and support. Established accounts Fully authorized A+ certified service center Dell, H.P., Lenovo, Asus, Cisco, Microsoft, Acer, Epson, Samsung, Lexmark, Toshiba, Pansonic, certifed reseller. Dell service center Xplornet high speed dealer and installer Shaw Direct HD TV dealer and installer Established staff. Excellent store front and one of the highest traffic area in the city new end of town. 5 year lease included. Includes company name accounts, certification, established credit terms with suppliers. Also includes authorizations from Dell, Lenovo, H.P. etc. NEW 2012 Orlando Company Van full logos Owner wanting to retire. Willing to stay on part- time Selling price $169,000.00 306-761-1515
